title: Ep 520 | Jase Takes On False Christian Beliefs & the Great Irony of False Gospels
description:
Jase addresses the false belief that people must achieve a certain level of spiritual behavior before they can earn God's love. Larry Bowles discusses how we must have a childlike faith in order to enter the kingdom of heaven. Phil points out where the epicurean and stoic philosophers of Greece really got it wrong. And Al talks about the irony of the false gospels.

Watch the Unashamed overtime show, only on BlazeTV: https://BlazeTV.com/Unashamed
